text: Ndipo Mulungu ali kuperekanso fanizo la anthu ena awiri, mmodzi wa iwo wosayankhula amene sangathe kuchita chilichonse, ndi wosathandiza Ambuye wake chifukwa kulikonse kumene amamutuma iye sabweretsa chabwino. Kodi iyeyu ndi wofanana ndi iye amene amalamula mwachilungamo ndipo ali mâ€™njira yoyenera
